name: De Pizza Hunt
description:
You are a guy, who loves pizza. And you want to make as many of them, as you can. So you travel to get all the ingredients for it. But you need to be quick, as a laser wants to make a pizza from you!

WARNING: the web version might run slow, so you better use the bin builds.

Controls:

  • Arrows: move
  • C: some debug
  • Supports joypads!

Made for pizza jam, with pico-8.
